text: Mocedades () is a Spanish singing group. They were from the Basque Autonomous Community. They represented Spain in the Eurovision Song Contest in 1973. Their best known song was "Eres TÃº". In 2014, Mocedades became the name of two bands: one with Izaskun Uranga as its leader and the other with Javier Garay. A third group, El Consorcio, is made of former Mocedades members who left the group but have continued a career together outside the Mocedades brand.Article from Radio Formula, 6 Oct 2011 ==References== Category:Spanish musical groups Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Mocedades
